quest.twr.13AA30FB9CD620EB.description.4: The produced creosote will be stored in this creosote funnel, and the creosote can be taken out with containers such as barrels and ceramic buckets.

quest.twr.13ADB3F08AD180B7.description.1: Unlike the original version, where tools can only be repaired on an anvil, Tetra's modular tools can be repaired directly on the workbench using the materials used to craft the tools, which results in a lower repair cost.

quest.twr.13D9DE54DF8117C2.description.3: Then hold ore or fuel right-click on the raw material block and put the rest material into the bloomery.
quest.twr.13D9DE54DF8117C2.description.4: Ignite on the top raw material block to start the bloomery.
quest.twr.13D9DE54DF8117C2.description.5: The &6&lbloomery needs blast from bellows during operation.
quest.twr.13D9DE54DF8117C2.description.6: &6&lAfter the the process is completed and the fire goes out, &bimmediately &6use a pickaxe to mine the blocks in it &bwhile it's still hot&f several times to get iron ingots.

quest.twr.1DF200F6772308C7.description.2: &6This prospector pick might only yield approximate info
quest.twr.1DF200F6772308C7.description.3: &lIf you need more details, you would need the other two types of propsecting tools.
quest.twr.1DF200F6772308C7.subtitle: Geological exploration
quest.twr.1F2BD4A72596B287.description.2: &6Output energy on the front and input rotation power on the back.
quest.twr.1F2BD4A72596B287.subtitle: Cut the magnetic flux with me
quest.twr.1F615C38B1A015E5.description.1: &lHover the mouse over the item to be queried,
quest.twr.1F615C38B1A015E5.description.2: &lUse &bR&r to query the recipe and &bU&r to query what items can be made.
quest.twr.1F615C38B1A015E5.description.4: &lMany items &3have multiple recipes! &6Remember to turn the page.
quest.twr.1F615C38B1A015E5.description.5: &l2x2 crafting table recipes are also doable &bin your inventory
quest.twr.1F615C38B1A015E5.description.7: &c&lPlease read this quest patiently as this is of great importance.
quest.twr.1F615C38B1A015E5.subtitle: &l&6Your best helper, JEI
quest.twr.1F615C38B1A015E5.title: Find Recipes
quest.twr.1F94471C5310ECFA.subtitle: No electric current
quest.twr.20E34B234337C28A.description.1: Now I've lit a fire, it's much warmer. But it could be better if I get an enclosed shelter.
quest.twr.20F1DD1209093059.description.1: Mixed in food to enhance satiety.
quest.twr.20F1DD1209093059.subtitle: Occasionally obtained when chopping wood
quest.twr.20F1DD1209093059.title: Wood scum
quest.twr.213A65543DF1FCB8.description.1: You may modify a Bronze Sword. Get yourself a handy weapon!
quest.twr.2148082183BBDF76.description.1: Some researches are too complex to calculate by hand and must be done with the help of a calculator. &eAccess power(stress) from the side of the calculator, requires stress that 64xRPM.&r
quest.twr.2148082183BBDF76.description.2: The calculator does not consume stress when it is not working and has an internal cache for results. If the computation cache is full, it will stop working.
quest.twr.2148082183BBDF76.description.3: Mechanical calculator have &cNO GUI&r. &cRight click&r the calculator after starting a research to gain the points inside, but would reset any existed calculations. With goggles, you would be able to inspect its working status and stored points.
quest.twr.2148082183BBDF76.subtitle: Increasing hashrate is the first priority
quest.twr.2148082183BBDF76.title: Mechanical calculator
quest.twr.215BC2E7271F1478.description.1: Open your inventory to check your nutritional value. There are &abeneficial&r and &charmful&r ones.
quest.twr.215BC2E7271F1478.description.3: If your &aharmful nutritional value&r is too high, you will gain a &cdebuff&r.
quest.twr.215BC2E7271F1478.description.4: All &abeneficial nutritional values&r exceeding 80%% will increase your maximum health.
quest.twr.215BC2E7271F1478.description.6: &cHarmful&r ones gain and decay faster than &abeneficial&r ones. So there's no need to avoid &charmful nutrition values&r, just keeping a balanced diet is important.
quest.twr.215BC2E7271F1478.description.7: When you die, you will lose nutrients and the negative effects caused by  &bnumber of deaths in a short period of time&r are very dangerous for the early gameplay. Run if you see any dangerous creatures.
quest.twr.215BC2E7271F1478.subtitle: Balanced diet
quest.twr.215BC2E7271F1478.title: Nutrition
quest.twr.2292AB368EF121C2.description.1: With edible mushrooms as seed, it can produce mushroom
quest.twr.2292AB368EF121C2.title: Incubating mushroom
quest.twr.2406D98489C938B8.description.2: &6&lNo trading, no killing. &rAgain, this is not in real world!
quest.twr.2406D98489C938B8.subtitle: Fur coat
quest.twr.24720864351339DC.description.2: It's unpalatable, but it can fill your stomach.
quest.twr.24720864351339DC.subtitle: Bread with sawdust
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.047874DA9F5AB: Additional reading: Dietary Guidelines for Passengers
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.description.1: People living in space need adequate nutrition.
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.description.3: Not eating enough &afruits and vegetables&r can lead to &cscurvy&r, which makes it very difficult for wounds to heal.
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.description.4: Inadequate &aprotein&r intake can lead to severe &canemia&r, leading to general weakness.
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.description.5: Adequate intake of &avegetable oils&r, also known as unsaturated fatty acids, is what is needed to &amaintain and improve human's thinking function&a.
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.description.6: A proper intake of &agrains&r is essential, which can give you a feeling of fullness.
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.description.7: Avoid taking too much &cvitamin D&r, which can lead to vitamin D poisoning and &cmild anemia&r and &cbone pain&r.
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.description.8: Avoid eating too much &csugar&r, which can lead to &cdiabetes&r, making it &aharder for wounds to heal naturally&r and causing unusually high hunger.
quest.twr.24E7D1E02BE55A8E.subtitle: Bread is the staff of life
quest.twr.25E712ACCAB68E99.description.1: Normally, death makes you drops everything except for&b equipment, tools on hand, and trinket &r(&ecan be changed in configuration&r.).
quest.twr.25E712ACCAB68E99.description.2: And death reduces your diet nutritional values.
quest.twr.25E712ACCAB68E99.description.4: &e&lTherefore, please avoid death as much as possible.
quest.twr.25E712ACCAB68E99.subtitle: When people are killed, they die
quest.twr.25E712ACCAB68E99.title: Death penalty
quest.twr.25F5289EF9A76559.description.0: Domesticating Bison to get cows. Cows eat grass or dry grass to produce milk.
quest.twr.25F5289EF9A76559.subtitle: Domesticating Bison
quest.twr.2659A48FDF01B1B7.description.1: You can build a multiblock clock to display current in-game time.
quest.twr.2659A48FDF01B1B7.description.2: &mWhy would you ever use it to power a machine???
quest.twr.2659A48FDF01B1B7.subtitle: Spectacular! But what's the point...
quest.twr.279DA3B6F5DE7753.subtitle: Silica crystals blended with redstone
quest.twr.289D04E29639F155.description.1: You may want to make automated device by now.
quest.twr.289D04E29639F155.description.2: Although you can get wool, you may be too lazy to do so.
quest.twr.289D04E29639F155.description.3: &eAll create recipes with wool&r can use &bstrings&r instead. (See JEI)
quest.twr.289D04E29639F155.subtitle: Not clue.
quest.twr.289D04E29639F155.title: Subtitution for wool
quest.twr.28F313C8E1312A2B.6CB265B632F33: I've understood, and will be careful before get in the water.
quest.twr.28F313C8E1312A2B.description.1: Although most rivers are now covered with ice, it is still resourceful underneath. Lots of &eclay, gravel, and copper gravel&r: all important.
quest.twr.28F313C8E1312A2B.description.2: But clearly it is dangerous to get wet in such coldness.
quest.twr.28F313C8E1312A2B.description.3: To prevent hypothermia, I can light a campfire going on the beach, get rid of all my clothes, and finish collecting quickly underneath, be aware of my oxygen. Once I am back, I should heat myself until the &ewet&r effect is gone and get my clothes on.
quest.twr.28F313C8E1312A2B.subtitle: Winter swimming guidelines
quest.twr.28F313C8E1312A2B.title: Adventures under the ice
quest.twr.291DA52EE6F8E5AF.description.1: You can also improve fuel efficiency by grinding charcoals
quest.twr.291DA52EE6F8E5AF.subtitle: sustainable development
quest.twr.29533DFBD579CA2F.description.1: Used to blow air into the bloomery.
quest.twr.29533DFBD579CA2F.description.2: One port can supply multiple bellows to work.
quest.twr.29533DFBD579CA2F.subtitle: Tuyere
quest.twr.29C8077E15E6C418.description.1: Compressing the snowballs I shoveled into packed snow: it doesn't easily melt, so I can use it for shelter. If I get enough straws, a straw shelter could also be great.
quest.twr.29C8077E15E6C418.subtitle: Use what you have
quest.twr.29C8077E15E6C418.title: Shelter
quest.twr.29DCBBB54EE90E51.description.1: Placing lava in the front can be used as a furnace.
quest.twr.29DCBBB54EE90E51.description.2: Placing water in the front can be used to wash minerals.
quest.twr.29DCBBB54EE90E51.description.3: Putting flame in the front can be used as a smoker.
quest.twr.29DCBBB54EE90E51.subtitle: Single machine, Tripe usages
quest.twr.2A8533418E3A8B06.description.2: Mica schists, rhyolites, komatiites, and red-black dacite.
quest.twr.2AE5C29C6D65FB00.description.1: Some coals are of high quality and can be bonded into briquettes by adding a small amount of oil.
quest.twr.2AE5C29C6D65FB00.subtitle: Just simplifies manufacturing
quest.twr.2B0D00CB09B96703.description.1: Protected cage with inner lining would keep animal inside from cold to death.
quest.twr.2B0D00CB09B96703.subtitle: Circus
quest.twr.2D570AD59FE2D6E1.description.1: Ponder about &6&lInvar Block&r, check the structure &b&lIf the top of the structure is not displayed, just reduce "Video Settings"-"GUI Size"
quest.twr.2D570AD59FE2D6E1.description.2: Redstone interface can be used to switch mode. No redstone signal would keep unchanged, 1-5 would shut down generator, 6-10 would turn it on, 11 or more would turn on overdrive. &cYou may need redstone wire from IE to control it.
quest.twr.2D570AD59FE2D6E1.description.3: Blue interface is fluid input, Orange one is energy output. Item can input and output anywhere.
quest.twr.2D570AD59FE2D6E1.subtitle: Heat Supply
quest.twr.2D570AD59FE2D6E1.title: Tier Two Generator
quest.twr.2E54EBA4E016412C.description.1: You need to charge it with steam charger to use it
quest.twr.2E54EBA4E016412C.description.2: Provide stable heat according to your ambient temperature, prevents cold damage.
quest.twr.2E54EBA4E016412C.subtitle: Iron Man is actually myself
quest.twr.2E96E546DCA1486C.description.1: The Generators can burn most &6solid fuel with high fuel value&r, refer to JEI for details.
quest.twr.2E96E546DCA1486C.title: Fuel
quest.twr.2EBC4AB3DDFC6BA0.description.1: It saves space for power transfer
quest.twr.2EBC4AB3DDFC6BA0.subtitle: Rotation Optimization
quest.twr.2ED180AF29DA4A90.description.2: Lethargic is just a status effect. &c&lIt can't be removed&r, but it would disappear when you have a nice inspiration recover rate or when you get enough inspiration.
quest.twr.2ED180AF29DA4A90.description.3: Some machines or device would speed up the inspiration recover process.
quest.twr.2ED180AF29DA4A90.subtitle: Take &kabcds
quest.twr.2F9F42B32CEDA8B6.description.1: Can no longer need gear use to change speed.
quest.twr.3078BCEE3E402DED.description.1: Basic liquid container for cool liquids.
quest.twr.3078BCEE3E402DED.description.2: Right click on water block with an empty barrel to fill it directly.
quest.twr.3078BCEE3E402DED.subtitle: Very full
quest.twr.3102993072F3C8B9.description.1: Due to the limited conditions, I can only use this primitive workbench to craft items. First, attach a piece of flint to a stick to craft a basic flint knife. Then, right-click on the workbench to place the materials according to the crafting recipe. Finally, use the flint knife to complete the item crafting.
quest.twr.3102993072F3C8B9.subtitle: The flint knife is crafted directly in the inventory. Sometimes, crafting requires other tools besides the knife, and you can check the recipes in JEI.
quest.twr.3102993072F3C8B9.title: Primitive Workbench
quest.twr.31ED006279866288.description.2: Mica schists, rhyolites, komatiites, and red-black dacite.
quest.twr.32A497C69C641D2B.description.1: &6&lThe steam input rate needs to be large enough to make it work. Try hand crank with large cogwheel on a pump.
quest.twr.32A497C69C641D2B.description.2: You can use the goggles to check the running status
quest.twr.32A497C69C641D2B.description.3: Don't forget to pick up the prototypes you made at the &b drawing table&r!
quest.twr.32A497C69C641D2B.subtitle: Steam
quest.twr.32DB7CCD0A73D98F.description.1: Hay bales are very suitable for cultivating stress-resistant decomposers-fungi.
quest.twr.32DB7CCD0A73D98F.subtitle: Soilless cultivation
quest.twr.32DB7CCD0A73D98F.title: Fungal medium
quest.twr.32E5D942F1FE8645.description.1: It is impossible to chop down trees with bare hands in this freezing snow. I must quickly find some materials to make simple tools, like flint and rusty metal, which might come in handy. I can go to the riverbank and check; there should be some flint hidden beneath the ice.
quest.twr.32E5D942F1FE8645.subtitle: Gathering basic resources
quest.twr.32E5D942F1FE8645.title: "Real Siberian" digging potatoes
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.1: Water is very important for your survival.
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.2: &6The water bag you got from your ship can be filled by right-clicking a water source block.
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.3: But this is unpurified water, which will cause you to be thirsty after drinking it.
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.4: A better alternative is to drink purified water, which will not cause the thirst effect.
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.5: After you get a water filter or a campfire, you can purify or boil it to obtain pure water.
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.subtitle: One cannot live without water
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.title: Drinking
quest.twr.34E4EC05F478BB1B.description.1: The gem mines on this planet have long been exhausted. To obtain gems, you can only search for &eGeodes&r in the deep caves.
quest.twr.34E4EC05F478BB1B.description.2: Place the Geode on the &eWorkbench&r and use a hammer to strike it. There is a chance to obtain various gems, with the number of gems obtained influenced by the hammer's Fortune level.
quest.twr.34E4EC05F478BB1B.subtitle: Resolve with hammers
quest.twr.34E4EC05F478BB1B.title: Obtain Gems
quest.twr.3549A50510878505.subtitle: A pot of rainbow mixture
quest.twr.36960F1D7CDC8B30.description.1: Can restore your body temperature and health in your shelter, and of course you can also barbecue.
quest.twr.36960F1D7CDC8B30.description.2: If there are no other ignition tools, Hold the flints with both hands and right click to try to ignite.
quest.twr.36960F1D7CDC8B30.description.3: &6Newly built campfire contains no &lfuel&r&6. Fuel should be added before ignition.
quest.twr.36960F1D7CDC8B30.description.6: Throwing fuels on the fire can make it burn longer
quest.twr.36960F1D7CDC8B30.subtitle: Warming up
quest.twr.36960F1D7CDC8B30.title: Warm Campfire
quest.twr.37726761B26CE51C.description.1: You can also complete the research by submitting the full amount of calculation points.
quest.twr.37726761B26CE51C.description.2: &aCalculation points are earned by corresponding machine.
quest.twr.37726761B26CE51C.description.3: &6&lUntil you have the ability to create machines, all researches can be unlock &3by completing the corresponding clues
quest.twr.37726761B26CE51C.subtitle: Hashrate 114514K
quest.twr.37B4F2A2F05B5332.description.1: &eProduction rate for a single calculator is slow, and its storage is fairly low.
quest.twr.37B4F2A2F05B5332.description.2: However, if you build a few mechanical calculators and connect them to each other, you would take these advantages:
quest.twr.37B4F2A2F05B5332.description.3: Firstly, you produce research points faster
quest.twr.37B4F2A2F05B5332.description.4: Secondly, total storage amount have increased
quest.twr.37B4F2A2F05B5332.description.5: &6&lI can use the theory on other similar problems, that's how a factory build.
quest.twr.37B4F2A2F05B5332.subtitle: Not Factorization[FZ]
quest.twr.37B4F2A2F05B5332.title: Building up a factory
quest.twr.3840FFD53990ECA2.description.2: Mica schist, rhyolite, komatiite, porphyry basalt, granite, diorite, pegmatite.
quest.twr.391E30AD9CB7147F.description.1: The drawing desk can be used to view the technology tree and conduct researches.
quest.twr.391E30AD9CB7147F.description.3: &c①&rClick on the Tech Tree button to open the Tech Tree interface, and click on Research in the list on the left to view research relationships.
quest.twr.391E30AD9CB7147F.description.4: Click again to open the details and select &b[Submit Materials and Start Study]&r to begin a study.
quest.twr.391E30AD9CB7147F.description.6: &b ②&rClick the Pause Research button to cancel the current research, &b the research progress will be saved&r.
quest.twr.391E30AD9CB7147F.subtitle: Start gain knowledge
quest.twr.391E30AD9CB7147F.title: Research for basic knowledges
quest.twr.39C5B2690D8A6DEC.description.1: Build some complex machine factory with them
quest.twr.39C5B2690D8A6DEC.subtitle: Moving Structures
quest.twr.39E837A6FC653395.description.1: Can receive energy from generator and generate rotation forces with the same capacity of bronze engines.
quest.twr.39E837A6FC653395.subtitle: Stirling engine
quest.twr.3A91A02EB59A7919.description.1: Another metal that can be smelted at present,
quest.twr.3A91A02EB59A7919.description.2: Maybe a better alloy can be made.
quest.twr.3A91A02EB59A7919.description.3: &6Most of the nickel ores are in the deep igneous rock.
quest.twr.3A91A02EB59A7919.subtitle: Better metal
quest.twr.3A91A02EB59A7919.title: Nickel
quest.twr.3B306015B7675BD1.description.1: Smart guy like you would try to build a nether portal with lava and ceramic bucket.
quest.twr.3B306015B7675BD1.description.2: But it's too cold here! You cannot use such &5&lPyro Magic!&r
quest.twr.3B306015B7675BD1.description.3: You probably needs &6&lAnother Way&r to get to the Dimension Beneath. But after all, you cannot find other ways with your current understanding of this world.
quest.twr.3B306015B7675BD1.description.4: Before you got to that point, &c&lyou won't need any material from the Dimension Beneath&r
quest.twr.3B306015B7675BD1.subtitle: Not-gonna-work, not now!
quest.twr.3B7B7A0BC0CF3CE0.description.1: Now that I have collected enough firewood, to light the bonfire, I need to gather some ignition materials.
quest.twr.3B7B7A0BC0CF3CE0.description.2: You can start a fire by rubbing flint against other metals (placing them in two hands), or you can use two wooden sticks to craft a fire starter. Aim at the bonfire and hold the right mouse button to ignite it.
quest.twr.3B7B7A0BC0CF3CE0.subtitle: Two fire starting methods
quest.twr.3B7B7A0BC0CF3CE0.title: Light a fire
quest.twr.3BBB2213C574F333.description.1: A charcoal pencil and stone plate are required to complete a basic level research paper.
quest.twr.3BBB2213C574F333.subtitle: Basic writing instruments
quest.twr.3BF2DCE33791510B.description.1: In this chapter, your main goal is to find minerals and craft &b drawing table&r, with which you can start researching, unlocking more items and recipes, and eventually smelting your first iron and entering the Iron Age.
quest.twr.3BF2DCE33791510B.subtitle: From stone to iron
quest.twr.3C4CEEBFF8DCF448.description.1: One of the main components of bronze.
quest.twr.3C4CEEBFF8DCF448.subtitle: Alloy composition
quest.twr.3C4CEEBFF8DCF448.title: Tin
quest.twr.3E8F565DE61309B2.description.1: If you have played Create, you probably know wooden cogwheels.
quest.twr.3E8F565DE61309B2.description.2: However, in this cold weather, the wood products are too weak.
quest.twr.3E8F565DE61309B2.description.3: Here, the minimum material requirement for making cogwheels is &ebronze.
quest.twr.3E8F565DE61309B2.subtitle: Forget about wooden cogwheels
quest.twr.3EF706F5A31CDDD6.description.1: Connect to a working Generator to transmit high-pressure heat energy
quest.twr.3EF706F5A31CDDD6.subtitle: Tightly bound
quest.twr.40254682DFE145B8.description.2: Diorite, rhyolite, gabbro, granodiorite, and komatiite
quest.twr.404CFF89CCFE9D6B.description.1: &6&lTransferring power is the crucial step toward industrialization
quest.twr.404CFF89CCFE9D6B.description.2: Now you can build various machines!
quest.twr.4138E3A9915F811C.description.1: You can build light industrial machines with aluminum!
quest.twr.4138E3A9915F811C.description.3: From now on, you are already an &bProficient&r Modpack player. You should learn to use &6JEI&r and &bMod Tutorials&r to determine what you should make next.
quest.twr.4138E3A9915F811C.description.4: There won't be any optional tag any later.
quest.twr.4138E3A9915F811C.subtitle: Immersive Machines
quest.twr.4138E3A9915F811C.title: Light Industry
quest.twr.417AC14073DD4249.description.1: A simple bed to set a respawn point.
quest.twr.417AC14073DD4249.subtitle: Unlocks Chapter: &bA Day of Polar Medic
quest.twr.41D8E04627E55A86.description.1: You can now handle wood more easily
quest.twr.41D8E04627E55A86.description.2: It can also cut down trees.
quest.twr.42AF456D165CBF75.description.1: Needs to use a flint knife to skin the fur.
quest.twr.42AF456D165CBF75.description.3: Can be used to make straps (belts) that are stronger than ordinary ropes
quest.twr.42AF456D165CBF75.subtitle: Hard and flexible
quest.twr.42D860535BFF35C4.description.1: By adding gel to high-quality coal powder, you can use fuel with maximum efficiency.
quest.twr.42D860535BFF35C4.subtitle: Luxury choice
quest.twr.42D8CA1487A024B8.description.1: You may find wild mushrooms on tree chunks, they can be cooked into soup.
quest.twr.42D8CA1487A024B8.description.2: But not all mushrooms are edible, cooking can't remove their toxicity.
quest.twr.42D8CA1487A024B8.subtitle: It's poisonous!
quest.twr.42D8CA1487A024B8.title: Mushrooms
quest.twr.432F702802327860.description.1: With rotten flesh as seed, it can produce protein fluid from foods.
quest.twr.432F702802327860.description.2: Protein drops can be used in making mystery chocolate.
quest.twr.432F702802327860.description.3: Specially, rotten flesh are only required to start. No more would cost unless the efficiency goes down to 0. If the efficiency goes down to 0, the current process would fail.
quest.twr.432F702802327860.subtitle: IT IS CHOCOLATE
quest.twr.443AD02B85632386.description.2: Polar bears, deers, or mammoths on sea ice are all good choices, there are too many of them now
quest.twr.443AD02B85632386.description.3: &6&lPolar bears are endangered creatures in reality, please protect wild animals!
quest.twr.443AD02B85632386.subtitle: Some hairs with fur
quest.twr.45007D04E07C8647.description.1: 使用丝绸、皮革、鳞甲等材料打造工具则需要切削工具，现阶段只需要青铜刀就足够使用了。
quest.twr.4543F3B5F937E6B0.description.1: Put quicklime into a barrel with water to get lime water.
quest.twr.4543F3B5F937E6B0.description.4: (You can also get it from desert, actually)
quest.twr.4543F3B5F937E6B0.subtitle: It make sense
quest.twr.4548F432A872DA92.description.1: Some recipes require heated to process normally.
quest.twr.4548F432A872DA92.description.2: This burner can easily do this.
quest.twr.4548F432A872DA92.subtitle: Save the blaze
quest.twr.45C051309242620B.description.1: After placing the tool on the Workbench, you can see its durability below the tool. Polishing will consume durability, and some components or materials may consume more durability.
quest.twr.45C051309242620B.description.2: The tool's durability is provided by the handle. Click on the handle - basic handle, then click the button on the left side of the material box to view the durability information provided by different materials used for the handle (this also includes other information related to handle crafting, which requires the Holographic Sphere).
quest.twr.45C051309242620B.title: Durability
quest.twr.45E2EF843333B846.description.1: Now I have wood, but to turn the logs into planks, I need a sturdy base to split them. I need to go mine some stone first.
quest.twr.45E2EF843333B846.subtitle: Mining tools
quest.twr.45FBD9AC4E48BF09.description.1: It works faster, more efficiently, and can handle more Chemistry! You'll need Graphite Electrodes to let it work.
quest.twr.45FBD9AC4E48BF09.description.2: Read the Engineer's Manual for building instructions
quest.twr.45FBD9AC4E48BF09.subtitle: 1800%% Efficiency
quest.twr.45FBD9AC4E48BF09.title: Industrial Electrolyzer
quest.twr.4600CF7553C26ED0.description.1: Grind items that are not so hard.
quest.twr.4600CF7553C26ED0.subtitle: No need to do it yourself
quest.twr.4600CF7553C26ED0.title: Mechanical Grinder
quest.twr.4625CA3FEAF6908B.description.1: Used to build bloomery, and can also be used to build houses.
quest.twr.4625CA3FEAF6908B.subtitle: Heat resistant
quest.twr.469A40EB19ACE723.description.1: By installing wool, leather, and iron ingots on the belt in sequence, you can provide more durability and install more storage pouches or other components.
quest.twr.469A40EB19ACE723.title: More integrity
quest.twr.477565C132877FBA.description.1: I made a hoe to try to clear and cultivate the land, but this damn place is just too cold. Most of the crops show no signs of growth after being planted. I need to restore the soil temperature to normal before I can plant crops. Obviously, a campfire is not a good choice.
quest.twr.477565C132877FBA.description.2: For now, I have to rely on other methods to obtain food.
quest.twr.477565C132877FBA.description.3: With the advancement of technology in the later chapters, the soil can be thawed.
quest.twr.477565C132877FBA.subtitle: Why don't we do something else?
quest.twr.477565C132877FBA.title: Plantation
quest.twr.4785733C81711840.description.1: I have an electrode. I have a steel pot. Pa! Electrolyzer!
quest.twr.4785733C81711840.description.2: This electrolyzer is so simple that it cannot collect gas or making high power recipes. But is enough for producing &baluminum&r.
quest.twr.4785733C81711840.description.3: Energy goes right at the energy interface. No interface on the left. All the rest can be fluid and item interface except top is item only.
quest.twr.4785733C81711840.description.4: You may need a larger one later.
quest.twr.4785733C81711840.subtitle: Just a pot with electrodes
quest.twr.47F458D8E94E5367.description.2: At least one bellow is required.
quest.twr.47F458D8E94E5367.description.3: &6&lPay attention to the orientation of the vent
quest.twr.47F458D8E94E5367.subtitle: Oxygen combustion
quest.twr.47F9EC8C18040D6D.description.1: This pair of snowshoes help you travel through powdered snow and improve speed on any snowy terrain.
quest.twr.47F9EC8C18040D6D.subtitle: Unlocks Chapter: &bA Day of Tundra Traveller
quest.twr.4845A9B7B7B2B4A5.description.1: Can be used in serial assembly recipes, see JEI for details.
quest.twr.4845A9B7B7B2B4A5.subtitle: Imitate player right click
quest.twr.48D63E2DA4BF2E9C.description.1: Soaking charcoal with oil and pressing it can slightly improve the efficiency of charcoal utilization. But the charcoal is too loose, you need to pay a lot of oil to bond.
quest.twr.48D63E2DA4BF2E9C.subtitle: Oyakodon
quest.twr.49C0A13F97114740.description.1: You must have noticed the temperature value on the left side of the weather forecast, which shows the &benvironmental temperature&r of your location.
quest.twr.49C0A13F97114740.description.3: Environmental temperature is affected by a variety of factors such as day and night, weather, and altitude.
quest.twr.49C0A13F97114740.description.4: You can raise it manually by using things like a &6campfire&r.
quest.twr.49C0A13F97114740.description.6: Simply put &bthe lower the Environmental temperature, the faster the body temperature will drop&r.
quest.twr.4B46838E7C65D4C4.description.1: The sulfur needs to handle pyrite.
quest.twr.4B6840707D77E2C0.description.1: Has better performance than pure copper.
quest.twr.4B6840707D77E2C0.subtitle: Basic material
quest.twr.4B6FFA5A9140019F.description.1: If I want to make more durable tools, I need to find suitable binding materials. Twisting dry grass into rope not only makes it strong and durable but can also be used to secure tool components, providing reliable stability for the tools.
quest.twr.4B6FFA5A9140019F.subtitle: Straw can be crafted directly in the inventory. Simple tools can also be crafted directly in the inventory.
quest.twr.4B6FFA5A9140019F.title: Straw Strings
quest.twr.4BBE69E2E2A4276F.description.1: Put a light engineering block at the bottom and the two steel sheet blocks vertically above it. Right-click it with the engineer's hammer
quest.twr.4BBE69E2E2A4276F.description.2: Use heat pipes to connect to the tier-two Generator at work, require some heat power to heat up.
quest.twr.4BBE69E2E2A4276F.description.3: Could heat a part of the surrounding area and melt snow and ice
quest.twr.4BBE69E2E2A4276F.subtitle: Expanding your base
quest.twr.4BBE69E2E2A4276F.title: Heater
quest.twr.4BD8236FEEBD7D3A.description.1: I dug a small pit in the ground, crouched down, and placed up to 8 rocks inside. Then, crouch and right-click to cover it with 6 pieces of dry grass and 3 logs. After that, light the top log on fire and wait for the flames to go out to obtain the stone.
quest.twr.4BD8236FEEBD7D3A.description.2: &4Hold down W over the dry grass to enter the thinking mode and view the construction process.&r
quest.twr.4BD8236FEEBD7D3A.subtitle: The bottom and sides of the pottery kiln must be completely sealed.
quest.twr.4BD8236FEEBD7D3A.title: I made it to Stone Age
quest.twr.4CC2FB4B9CE2367B.description.0: Domesticating Pheasants then feed hens with seeds to make them lay eggs.
quest.twr.4CC2FB4B9CE2367B.subtitle: Domesticating Pheasants
quest.twr.4CC5E16EFDE1368C.description.3: Used to make most Mechanical structures like shafts.
quest.twr.4CC5E16EFDE1368C.subtitle: Solid Black Metal
quest.twr.4CD30E566C5776E0.description.1: Bronze tools are harder and more durable than flint tools.
quest.twr.4CD30E566C5776E0.subtitle: Upgrade tools
quest.twr.4D3FCF56475C0CD7.description.1: &c①&rSelect an &bselectable&r element by clicking &o&7(click again to deselect)&r, then click another identical element to combine it.
quest.twr.4D3FCF56475C0CD7.description.3: The &b②&r element &b can be selected when both adjacent sides &r and the angle between them are blank, and the area outside the board is counted as blank.
quest.twr.4D3FCF56475C0CD7.description.5: The basic elements in gray can be matched with the same elements, and the "puzzle" and "discovery" in blue can be matched with each other.
quest.twr.4D3FCF56475C0CD7.description.7: The &6④&r "conversion" can be matched to the base element or to itself.
quest.twr.4D3FCF56475C0CD7.description.9: &a⑤&r Roman numerals&b in order&r match the "research", and when the number is eliminated, you can click on the "conclusion" to eliminate it.
quest.twr.4D3FCF56475C0CD7.subtitle: Sigma's Garden
quest.twr.4DD7D3E4613000E4.subtitle: Simple defense
quest.twr.4E2B2FEBD5031A2C.73EC18187328F: Please exit this screen and wait for the story begins.
quest.twr.4E2FF1AFA626A42B.description.1: Rye is one of the most cold-resistant crops. You can harvest rye after turning on the Generator as your initial ration.
quest.twr.4E2FF1AFA626A42B.subtitle: Hardy crops
quest.twr.4F8E2D7FDA9A1D17.description.1: You should get enough inspiration to finish the paper.
quest.twr.4F8E2D7FDA9A1D17.description.2: Inspirations are gained naturally during work at your shelter or travel outside. &6&lHaving a balanced diet as well as having nice and warm sleep would yield more inspiration during the day. &c&lBut these would not give you inspiration directly&r.
quest.twr.4F8E2D7FDA9A1D17.description.3: Inspirations are gained only when &6&lonline and not at any state of hypothermia or hyperthermia&r. And &c&lavoid using up all your inspiration&r. Since you would gain inspiration &csignificantly harder&r after that.
quest.twr.4F8E2D7FDA9A1D17.description.4: Sleeping beside generator or wearing warm cloth would improve sleeping quality.
quest.twr.4F8E2D7FDA9A1D17.description.6: Luckily, some would get knowledge during exploration in relics, which could be used instead of inspiration.
quest.twr.4F8E2D7FDA9A1D17.description.7: If your &enutrition level is low and resting environment is bad&r, or if you &eused all your inspiration&r, you will gain the lethargic state, &c&lindiciating very low inspiration regeneration rate&r.
quest.twr.4F8E2D7FDA9A1D17.subtitle: AAAAE-A-A-I-A-U
quest.twr.50428AA91D1E1EFF.description.1: Rotten flesh is disgusting. If we treat it a certain way, we could process it to be edible food.
quest.twr.50428AA91D1E1EFF.subtitle: Canteen simulator
quest.twr.50428AA91D1E1EFF.title: Rotten flesh processing
quest.twr.506C01A9BE167F7F.description.1: Put any mesh into the fishing net block to catch fish. They can be valuable protein source in early days to balance your diet.
quest.twr.506C01A9BE167F7F.description.2: &6Need to be thoroughly immersed four sides (including itself) in water to work.
quest.twr.506C01A9BE167F7F.subtitle: A winter fish pond
quest.twr.516392D8FE0C7E91.description.1: Cooking foods into stew can make them better, and providing more positive effects.
quest.twr.516392D8FE0C7E91.description.2: Please refer to manual for detailed cooking method and recipe
quest.twr.516392D8FE0C7E91.description.3: Just cook your handy cooking ingredient to get great benefits. Fantastic!
quest.twr.516392D8FE0C7E91.subtitle: Just don't burn your kitchen
quest.twr.516392D8FE0C7E91.title: Cooking stew
quest.twr.5287CFB7B7D5285E.description.1: With a coke oven, there is no need to construct charcoal pits again and again! Refer to the Engineer's Manual for the construction method.
quest.twr.5287CFB7B7D5285E.subtitle: Coke oven!
quest.twr.529E18F00974DC2D.description.1: Fruit trees would produce fruits ONLY if they are in warm environment.
quest.twr.529E18F00974DC2D.subtitle: Eating "walnuke" benefits your brain
quest.twr.543F5BC239D07C40.description.1: In Multiplayer, you may want to prevent your territory from being attacked.
quest.twr.543F5BC239D07C40.description.2: Press E to open the inventory, click the map on the top-left corner, and select the chunks you want to protect.
quest.twr.543F5BC239D07C40.description.3: Or you may press M to open the map and use the same method to claim chunks.
quest.twr.543F5BC239D07C40.description.4: Your &territory team is the same us the quest team&f, please follow the &cthe last quest's&f guidance to invite your friends.
quest.twr.543F5BC239D07C40.description.5: Before &cjoining a team, cancel all your existing chunks!
quest.twr.543F5BC239D07C40.description.6: &eChunk limit would increase as game proceeed.
quest.twr.543F5BC239D07C40.subtitle: Claiming chunks matters
quest.twr.543F5BC239D07C40.title: &6About Claiming Territorries
quest.twr.5493DF2D38C0B27C.description.1: Use a &eHammer&r to click on a &eCrafting Table&r to turn it into a workbench.
quest.twr.5493DF2D38C0B27C.description.2: The Workbench is central to tool making. In particular, you can craft a spear.
quest.twr.5493DF2D38C0B27C.subtitle: Unlocks &bA Day of Craftsman&r and &bA Day of Hunter
quest.twr.55BE6F159CF89342.subtitle: Extractor
quest.twr.55BE6F159CF89342.title: Rubber
quest.twr.55C39831FBBB94D8.subtitle: Not yet released
quest.twr.55C39831FBBB94D8.title: Tier Four Generator
quest.twr.56E5FD2809882B5F.description.1: Right now, surviving may be the most important goal. I must race against time to build a shelter and light a bonfire for warmth. Time is running out, as a snowstorm will arrive in a day. No time to waste, it's time to prepare for survival in the snow.
quest.twr.56E5FD2809882B5F.subtitle: Necessary Information
quest.twr.56E5FD2809882B5F.title: Chapter Guide
quest.twr.573841FD8018D4B1.description.1: The Generator is used to heat the soil. You gotta operate it before planting anything here!
quest.twr.573841FD8018D4B1.description.2: The Generator will be unlocked through tech progression. Be patient and have fun.
quest.twr.573841FD8018D4B1.description.3: &c&lNote: Each team can only have one unique Generator
quest.twr.573841FD8018D4B1.subtitle: Farming til the end of the world
quest.twr.573841FD8018D4B1.title: The Generator
quest.twr.57C83EF2BAA418AD.description.1: From T2 Generator, Generator needs heat conducting medium to utilize its full strength. Not providing heat conducting medium to it will result in nothing different than T1 Generator. You can visit this in detail in JEI.
quest.twr.57C83EF2BAA418AD.description.2: Input water can provide energy, but it will not boost the heating range nor the temperature.
quest.twr.57C83EF2BAA418AD.description.3: Input steam can allow T2 Generator to operate at its optimum while boosting its heating range and temperature.
quest.twr.57C83EF2BAA418AD.subtitle: Hotter
quest.twr.57C83EF2BAA418AD.title: Heat Conducting Medium
quest.twr.58037578505CB417.subtitle: A Difficult Journey
quest.twr.5808CFED17AE91D4.subtitle: Smelting Ingredient
quest.twr.5845439CF721309F.description.1: A practical machine, you can use it to increase the production of plates, and of course you can also make chocolate.
quest.twr.5845439CF721309F.subtitle: Tremendous stress
quest.twr.586D66C71A378A82.description.1: Primitive strategy smash two ingots into one plate.
quest.twr.586D66C71A378A82.subtitle: Metal plate
quest.twr.586D66C71A378A82.title: Copper plate
quest.twr.58912971B356779C.description.1: Use heat pipes to connect to the tier-two Generator at work. It consume heat power to pressurize. The higher the pressure the faster it works.
quest.twr.58912971B356779C.description.2: Hold the corresponding item and right-click to charge with steam/heat
quest.twr.58912971B356779C.description.3: Such as: heating vests, glass bottles, and any food that needs to be smoked
quest.twr.58912971B356779C.subtitle: Can even cook.
quest.twr.58EF2132D0431323.description.1: Pondering is a very important skill.
quest.twr.58EF2132D0431323.description.2: If there is a reminder about &6Pondering in item tooltip&r, press and hold &bW&6 to enter the Pondering scene.
quest.twr.58EF2132D0431323.description.3: Pondering can help you understand the purpose of a block or how to build a structure.
quest.twr.58EF2132D0431323.description.5: &c&lPlease read this quest patiently as this is of great importance.
quest.twr.58EF2132D0431323.subtitle: Important Skill
quest.twr.58EF2132D0431323.title: Pondering
quest.twr.5907E1263E6D81E2.description.2: Mica schists, rhyolites, komatiites, and red-black dacite.
quest.twr.5C078D2F43CA4048.description.1: A good helper in your factory
quest.twr.5C078D2F43CA4048.subtitle: Handy Tools
quest.twr.5C3681B30ADB26B9.description.3: 1 part rye flour + 1 bowl + 1 part sawdust + any edible filling
quest.twr.5C3681B30ADB26B9.subtitle: Rye porridge, but with sawdust
quest.twr.5CCD8F05D7402D4B.subtitle: Premium goods
quest.twr.5D52744D5382A6CA.description.1: High performance industrial metal in the cold.
quest.twr.5D52744D5382A6CA.subtitle: Light and Flexible
quest.twr.5D52744D5382A6CA.title: Bluish Aluminum
quest.twr.5D7B5ABC70D38636.description.1: Tired of waiting for mechanical calculators working? Here's what you want.
quest.twr.5D7B5ABC70D38636.description.2: Rubbing tool can be mounted on machine arms to gather research points.
quest.twr.5D7B5ABC70D38636.description.3: Rubbing tool must be assigned to an research by &6putting in a draw desk and examine&r before gathering research points. &c&lUnassigned ones does not accept any research points&r.
quest.twr.5D7B5ABC70D38636.description.4: After gathering some points inside, it can be &6put into draw desk and examine&r to draw its points into assigned research. &cExceeded points would be wasted.
quest.twr.5D7B5ABC70D38636.description.5: Rubbing tools have &6five uses&r, Each use can collect &ball&r points inside a calculator. So you may need to do some design to utilize its use.
quest.twr.5D7B5ABC70D38636.description.6: &e&lTips: you need to use redstone timer for this.
quest.twr.5D7B5ABC70D38636.subtitle: Send me a copy
quest.twr.5D803F0865A90DE0.description.1: You may get snowballs with a simple shovel.
quest.twr.5D803F0865A90DE0.subtitle: Pave the way
quest.twr.5DD231E4178E830D.description.1: &6It can be shapelessly crafted with any armor piece that cannot keep warm.
quest.twr.5DD231E4178E830D.description.2: Make it as warm as straw.
quest.twr.5DD231E4178E830D.subtitle: Something inside
quest.twr.5E3A878B95133DAD.description.1: Provides precise ore information in a small region.
quest.twr.5E3A878B95133DAD.description.2: &6More precise than a prospector pick, but has smaller detecting range.
quest.twr.5E3A878B95133DAD.subtitle: Home brew Ph.D. in Geology
quest.twr.5F455ED38549D9EF.subtitle: Not released yet
quest.twr.5F455ED38549D9EF.title: Tier Three Generator
quest.twr.6000F43C135FC068.description.1: The power generated by the hand crank is not much, but with a large cogwheel, it is enough to pump steam out and run a bronze steam engine.
quest.twr.6000F43C135FC068.description.2: After setting up the steam engine, you can free your hands.
quest.twr.6000F43C135FC068.description.3: You need it to drive some basic machines, such as mixers.
quest.twr.6000F43C135FC068.subtitle: People's power
quest.twr.603CDF88D762FEA8.description.1: Prospecting tools can be modified for easier repair.
quest.twr.603CDF88D762FEA8.description.2: And it can be honed to improve its range and correctness.
quest.twr.603CDF88D762FEA8.title: Modified Prospecting Tools
quest.twr.60C1118A879D4548.subtitle: "I step, you die"
quest.twr.60C1118A879D4548.title: Ice Age——The Return of Mammoth
quest.twr.61C600A54B4B7C50.description.1: This is the forging hammer that can craft more advanced hammers. However, the forging hammer starts at level five and may not have enough power for crafting. You need to install a thermal unit and combustion chamber to activate the level seven forging hammer.
quest.twr.61C600A54B4B7C50.title: Forging Hammer
quest.twr.634DBB9E76CD029B.description.1: &6As a power engineer, this pair of glasses is essential.
quest.twr.634DBB9E76CD029B.description.2: After wearing it, you can see a lot of internal information about machinery and steam equipment.
quest.twr.634DBB9E76CD029B.subtitle: Extra information
quest.twr.6356C6E09463F6AE.description.1: After drying, you get charcoal briquettes.
quest.twr.6356C6E09463F6AE.subtitle: Charcoal version of coal briquettes
quest.twr.643B93BCE91A0BB9.subtitle: Just bale the hay together
quest.twr.6496F756C2514C7A.description.1: You may find old broken electronic device in ruins or human settlements. They are broken and can no longer use. But their excellent design may inspire you.
quest.twr.6496F756C2514C7A.description.2: Put them into drawing desk and inspire to get knowledge. &e&lKnowledge can be used to write paper instead of inspiration&r, but you may need a lot of them.
quest.twr.6496F756C2514C7A.subtitle: Tear them down
quest.twr.6496F756C2514C7A.title: Electronic Waste
quest.twr.64B11670694B854C.description.1: Fruit trees would produce fruits ONLY if they are in warm environment.
quest.twr.64B11670694B854C.description.2: Fruits are good, but don't take too much.
quest.twr.64B11670694B854C.subtitle: A day an ...
quest.twr.64BD0FE7784B0BEB.description.1: You may have found some research &b can't be done with just clues&r.
quest.twr.64BD0FE7784B0BEB.description.3: This is where you'll need a &bMechanical Calculator&r, giving it access to rotation force to generate tech points, as described in the chapter "&bAcquiring Knowledge&r".
quest.twr.64BD0FE7784B0BEB.description.5: Don't forget to pick up the prototypes you made at the &b drawing table&r!
quest.twr.64BD0FE7784B0BEB.subtitle: Pure mechanical
quest.twr.64FD16EB3C180B7D.description.1: Prospecting tools can be modified for repairing.
quest.twr.64FD16EB3C180B7D.description.2: And it can be hounded for further accuracy.
quest.twr.654627121432688E.description.1: Creating a &eenclosed&r environment will insulate, reduce heat loss from the campfire, and increase the temperature within the space.
quest.twr.654627121432688E.description.2: Also building structures like &e fireplace&r can utilize the heat from a campfire more efficiently.
quest.twr.654627121432688E.subtitle: Not too close.
quest.twr.654627121432688E.title: Guide to Building Insulation
quest.twr.660F95E6765CD77A.description.1: The quests with cogs in the border are &bChapter Main Quests&r, which you need to complete before you can proceed to the next step.
quest.twr.660F95E6765CD77A.description.3: The circular quests are &bside quests&r and don't need to be completed in a hurry.
quest.twr.660F95E6765CD77A.description.5: The hexagonal tasks are hints that will help you solve most problems during the tour, &bso make sure you read them carefully&r.
quest.twr.660F95E6765CD77A.description.7: You'll get more hints as your journey progresses, so don't forget to check them out!
quest.twr.660F95E6765CD77A.description.8: &o&7 so many words may seem exhausting, the first thing you need to know about is temperature and drinking water!
quest.twr.660F95E6765CD77A.subtitle: Come back home
quest.twr.660F95E6765CD77A.title: Need Help?
quest.twr.66505076652885B8.description.1: Door made of bronze. It can be used as part of the charcoal pit for easy access.
quest.twr.66505076652885B8.description.2: Note: The direction of the door should be touching the coal pile in the charcoal pit.
quest.twr.66505076652885B8.subtitle: FBI open the door
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.description.1: If you are playing this modpack for the FIRST TIME,
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.description.2: we recommend that you follow the path laid out by the quest book.
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.description.3: If some quests are locked or cannot be completed,
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.description.4: it is probably because a previous quest is incomplete.
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.description.6: &6&lUnder any circumstances, the Quest Book is always your best friend
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.description.7: &c&lif you encounter problems or questions, then
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.description.1: &c&lPlease read this quest patiently since it is very important.
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.subtitle: Go to the Quest Book when you found something hard!
quest.twr.6667AA13CA3DAC9B.title: Quest Book -- Your Best Guide
quest.twr.66A550B05F529CD5.description.1: Still dealing with a bunch of flywheels? Try out this huge STEAM TURBINE!
quest.twr.66A550B05F529CD5.description.2: Read the Engineer's Manual for building instructions.
quest.twr.66A550B05F529CD5.subtitle: Abundant Energy
quest.twr.66A550B05F529CD5.title: Larger Alternator
quest.twr.6738A3C34A872FED.subtitle: High temperature resistance
quest.twr.6746167385331F16.description.1: Vegetable soup that pierces the throat.
quest.twr.6746167385331F16.description.3: At least 1 part of any vegetable + 1 part of sawdust + 1 bowl + any edible filling
quest.twr.6746167385331F16.subtitle: Can you really drink this?
quest.twr.688C57B7BC46E723.description.1: You need to use mechanical hand and conveyor belt to build an assembly line to assemble the capacitor.
quest.twr.688C57B7BC46E723.subtitle: Energy storage
quest.twr.688E6165A1E9A28C.description.1: I may not be able to leave here at once. Hunting for food is too risky, but it is too cold to &csustain enough temperature and humidity to plant crops&r.
quest.twr.688E6165A1E9A28C.description.2: Maybe I can repair the energy core taken from the airship
quest.twr.688E6165A1E9A28C.description.4: &d&lChapter "A Day of Generator Engineer" is now unlocked, refer to that for details
quest.twr.688E6165A1E9A28C.subtitle: Snow halation
quest.twr.688E6165A1E9A28C.title: Long term plan
quest.twr.689BB00EC2454F1F.description.1: Can put fuel into clay pot for smelting ores,
quest.twr.689BB00EC2454F1F.subtitle: Small belly, large capacity.
quest.twr.690B75C64EB9A7C1.description.1: In multiplayer teaming, research progress share between all team members.
quest.twr.690B75C64EB9A7C1.description.2: However, everyone in the team would get lesser inspiration.
quest.twr.690B75C64EB9A7C1.description.3: Because of this, we suggest everyone in the team take a part in the research and maintain good health.
quest.twr.690B75C64EB9A7C1.description.4: Also, there will be more punishment for &c&lloss of inspiration&r. So just treat your team members well.
quest.twr.690B75C64EB9A7C1.subtitle: Friendship is magic
quest.twr.690B75C64EB9A7C1.title: Tips for doing research in multiplayer
quest.twr.69D939596ED4C0AF.description.1: The Generator is the core of this modpack, a large multi-block structure used to heat the surrounding area. Ponder about the &b&lGenerator Core&r and check the multi-block structure.
quest.twr.69D939596ED4C0AF.description.2: Ponder about the &b&lGenerator Core&r and check the multi-block structure.
quest.twr.69D939596ED4C0AF.description.3: After setting up the structure, click the side with an engineer's hammer.
quest.twr.69D939596ED4C0AF.description.4: This can be upgraded in the future.
quest.twr.69D939596ED4C0AF.subtitle: Large fireplace
quest.twr.69D939596ED4C0AF.title: Tier One Generator
quest.twr.6A22E2D62D4719BE.description.1: Although I have some basic knowledge to make some simple items, I don't know how to create machines for production.
quest.twr.6A22E2D62D4719BE.description.2: I need to continue my research and exploration to provide better conditions for my survival.
quest.twr.6A22E2D62D4719BE.description.3: &lThe chapter &a"Gaining Knowledge"&f has been unlocked, please go to this chapter to see the detailed method of research.
quest.twr.6A22E2D62D4719BE.subtitle: Knowledge is power
quest.twr.6A22E2D62D4719BE.title: Research
quest.twr.6B7D4F59C921C1FC.description.1: Gotta hurry to get some wood. Nothing can be done without wood.
quest.twr.6B7D4F59C921C1FC.subtitle: It all starts from a tree
quest.twr.6C49B6777A13CC02.description.2: Mica schist, rhyolite, komatiite, porphyry basalt, granite, diorite, and pegmatite.
quest.twr.6CF9868197215C1D.description.2: Can hold various liquids and pour them out.
quest.twr.6CF9868197215C1D.subtitle: Big bowl
quest.twr.6D01046E549A087E.description.1: A hardy vegetable that can grow at very low temperature.
quest.twr.6D01046E549A087E.subtitle: vegetable
quest.twr.6D01046E549A087E.title: White radish
quest.twr.6D7D911961F81187.description.1: The hammer is the core tool of Tetra. To craft tools with higher-level materials, you need a higher-level hammer.
quest.twr.6D7D911961F81187.description.2: To upgrade the hammer, you need to use another hammer to craft the hammerhead. In other words, you need two hammers to perform the upgrade. It is recommended to craft two stone hammers (level 2), then replace both ends of one stone hammer with iron hammerheads (using the same material for both hammer ends grants an additional level). This will result in a level 3 hammer.
quest.twr.6D7D911961F81187.description.3: Similarly, a hammer with both heads made of black stone is a level 4 hammer.
quest.twr.6D7D911961F81187.description.4: To craft a more advanced hammer, you need to visit the forging ruins deep underground.
quest.twr.6D7D911961F81187.subtitle: Hammer can't hammer itself
quest.twr.6D7D911961F81187.title: Level Advance
quest.twr.6E83E2133A978D34.description.1: Use leather to wrap up straw lining. You now get a sleeping bag.
quest.twr.6E83E2133A978D34.description.2: Warm enough to fall asleep inside.
quest.twr.6E83E2133A978D34.subtitle: Carry On
quest.twr.6EC18F90620F0A48.description.1: &c&lRed block&r in multiblock demonstration is where you should use hammer to click after complete.
quest.twr.6EC18F90620F0A48.subtitle: Another Guidebook
quest.twr.6F2C2CCC90E4C4F6.description.2: The bench automatically uses tools from the surrounding tool racks, &b tools in the inventory are prioritized&r.
quest.twr.6F2C2CCC90E4C4F6.subtitle: Place tool racks within 5x5 Square area around the Workbench.
quest.twr.707E5C06843421A7.title: Gravel with Copper
quest.twr.70E6A4B9946F263A.description.1: Has your spacesuit totally fallen apart? It could get REALLY cold if you don't wear clothes. Just passable clothes, better than freezing to death (literally).
quest.twr.70E6A4B9946F263A.subtitle: The Must-have for Winter
quest.twr.7175C1158EE9178A.description.1: Storage is a big issue. This simple chest will lead you to wide possibilities.
quest.twr.7175C1158EE9178A.subtitle: Unlocks &bA Day of Logistics Engineer
quest.twr.718403EB34A5B46F.description.1: Right-click to use the flint knife to process leather.
quest.twr.718403EB34A5B46F.subtitle: Simple handling
quest.twr.71D389AF87847D7B.description.1: Its heat resistance is better than sand bricks, and you can use it to make blast furnace bricks.
quest.twr.72C69A6803998E32.description.1: The thermal unit is the battery for the forging hammer. Installing a thermal unit on the forging hammer provides power to it. The combustion chamber can increase the level of the forging hammer by one for each installation, with one on each side.
quest.twr.72C69A6803998E32.description.2: A level 6 forging hammer can craft an obsidian hammer, while a level 7 forging hammer can craft a Nether alloy hammer.
quest.twr.72C69A6803998E32.title: Battery and Combustion Chamber
quest.twr.72D5B725766622F4.description.2: Mica schists, rhyolites, komatiites, and red-black dacite.
quest.twr.73242CFC1E655F2D.description.1: Generates in surface limestone, dolostone, chalk, shale, and siltstone.
quest.twr.7359422ABAFA7721.description.3: At least 1.75 servings of any vegetable + 1 bowl + any edible filling
quest.twr.7359422ABAFA7721.subtitle: Soup made with a mess of vegetables
quest.twr.739B9AF9D9C2EC05.description.1: Superglue can be applied to blocks to attach blocks to the contraption. But only blocks with contact can stick to each other.
quest.twr.739B9AF9D9C2EC05.subtitle: Inseparable
quest.twr.73ADDB2F9A4F7C5D.description.1: You spent a few days warming up some fungus beds, and now you can finally enjoy the results.
quest.twr.73ADDB2F9A4F7C5D.description.2: &ePut mushrooms and/or other ingredients into the pot, while mushrooms take the major part, to cook mushroom soup.
quest.twr.73ADDB2F9A4F7C5D.subtitle: Full of love
quest.twr.743FEA6865CD1D90.description.1: T1 Generator can sustain cold resist crops like radish, hemp and barley.
quest.twr.743FEA6865CD1D90.description.2: &6&lHow about wait for a warm period and overdrive my generator? This may somehow make some other crops grow and harvest during the period.
quest.twr.743FEA6865CD1D90.subtitle: Planet vegetation process 0.000001%%
quest.twr.743FEA6865CD1D90.title: Planting Crops
quest.twr.7491448A8055DBE6.description.1: These beasts have extremely sharp teeth
quest.twr.7491448A8055DBE6.description.3: Yet approaching one of them is not a wise choice
quest.twr.7491448A8055DBE6.subtitle: Dangerous Beast
quest.twr.75154C5A6E2F3257.description.2: Most of the Magnetite spawns in the &6upper sedimentary rock,
quest.twr.75154C5A6E2F3257.description.3: Pyrite spawns in the &6lower igneous rock,
quest.twr.75154C5A6E2F3257.description.5: You may make &bcrafting table&r after getting iron.
quest.twr.75154C5A6E2F3257.subtitle: True base metal
quest.twr.75154C5A6E2F3257.title: Iron
quest.twr.7612A96FFEFC5635.description.1: Burn furnace fuel to convert water to steam.
quest.twr.7612A96FFEFC5635.description.2: Better take a look at the Fuel Treatment chapter in the quest book.
quest.twr.7612A96FFEFC5635.description.3: &6&lThe boiler must be placed on top of the burning chamber. Ponder may help.
quest.twr.7612A96FFEFC5635.subtitle: A small step for mankind
quest.twr.7612A96FFEFC5635.title: Bronze boiler
quest.twr.762141CEF64385FC.description.1: A belt made of rope can provide more quick slots, and storage pouches can be installed to provide additional storage space.
quest.twr.762141CEF64385FC.description.2: The initial belt can only hold a few storage pouches, but once wool is obtained, the storage space can be expanded.
quest.twr.762141CEF64385FC.title: Toolbelt
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.description.1: Sauna is the best choice to &6regenerate inspiration&r and  &egain beneficial buffs&r.
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.description.3: &bThe Floor&r consists of Sauna Vent and wooden planks. All planks must be within 5-block distance from the vent. No shape restriction.
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.description.4: &bThe Wall&r consists of wooden planks and must be built on the peripheral of The Floor. The height must be 3 (not including the floor but including the ceiling).
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.description.5: &bThe Ceiling&r consists of wooden planks. The height is at the third block of the wall. It must cover up the entire opening above.
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.description.6: There can be doors or trapdoors on the Wall and Ceiling, but the entire structure must be completely closed.
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.description.8: One sauna therapy takes around 50 seconds. You will gain large amount of inspiration reward immediately and “Sauna Therapy” effect for the entire day, continously regenerating inspiration.
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.description.9: If possessing the “Sauna Therapy” effect, you cannot gain this effect again or any additional inspiration.
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.description.1: Place medicine on the Sauna Vent to gain beneficial buffs.
The sauna time needed to gain the buff and the buff itself both depend on the medicine. You may view it in JEI.
Medicine Therapy is not in conflict with the “Sauna Therapy” effect mentioned above, but gaining medical effect needs longer time.
You must completely undress yourself before entering the Sauna, otherwise you won't get any effects.
Connect the Sauna Vent to a heat network powered by the Generator to make it work.
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.subtitle: Sauna Therapy
quest.twr.7627D80D3091F54C.title: Sauna Time!
quest.twr.76723451C6850C81.description.1: Wild animal meat contains exceeded &cVitamin E&r, &e&lHaving too much may cause poisoning&r.
quest.twr.76723451C6850C81.description.2: Be careful to keep a balanced diet and have some other kind of food.
quest.twr.76723451C6850C81.subtitle: Hunting is not always the best choice
quest.twr.76B2B1A3EC6D92CD.description.1: Craft logs into &eLog Piles&r and place the log pile in a closed space, leaving a small opening for ignition. After lighting it, immediately use other blocks to cover the small opening and extinguish the fire. Wait for the charcoal to be produced, then dig up the charcoal pile from the kiln to obtain charcoal.
quest.twr.76B2B1A3EC6D92CD.description.2: &4Hold down W over the log pile or charcoal to enter the thinking mode and view the construction process&r
quest.twr.76B2B1A3EC6D92CD.subtitle: After covering the small opening, if smoke appears from the block above the log pile, it means charcoal is being burned. When the smoke disappears, the process is complete.
quest.twr.76B2B1A3EC6D92CD.title: Charcoal Pit
quest.twr.76BFBA40C36D0699.description.1: Domesticated Animals can still resist some cold.
quest.twr.76BFBA40C36D0699.description.2: They need to be &efully feed to breed&r, and they would use its fat to resist low soil defrost level from 10% to 40%.
quest.twr.76BFBA40C36D0699.subtitle: Protect animal
quest.twr.76BFBA40C36D0699.title: Animal welfare
quest.twr.76E0A57CE55FFCEA.description.1: The rate of change in body temperature is influenced by &bambient temperature&r and &6clothing warmth values&r.
quest.twr.76E0A57CE55FFCEA.description.3: As your body temperature begins to drop, your experience bar will be replaced by a &bTemperature Indicator Bar&r. When it turns completely red you will gain a &bLoss of Temperature effect&r and begin to &bTake Damage&r.
quest.twr.76E0A57CE55FFCEA.description.4: If body temperature changes too quickly, you will get burned or forstbitten.
quest.twr.76E0A57CE55FFCEA.description.6: You wont be able to view detailed temperature readings without a thermometer.
quest.twr.76E0A57CE55FFCEA.title: Body temperature
quest.twr.770CD4281B427FDC.description.1: Pressed from wood dusts. Cheap in price and high in quality.
quest.twr.770CD4281B427FDC.subtitle: charcoals without coke oven
quest.twr.7762BF27B2BB8236.description.0: Wild Animals have very low economic values. They are aggressive and doesn't produce things other than meat. Maybe you can try to domesticate them.
quest.twr.7762BF27B2BB8236.description.1: You can feed them and their offsprings. After few generations, you can domesticate them.
quest.twr.7762BF27B2BB8236.description.3: Refer to chapter "A Day of Hunter" after you finish quest.
quest.twr.7762BF27B2BB8236.subtitle: Neutralize
quest.twr.7762BF27B2BB8236.title: Domesticating Wild Animals
quest.twr.77A7511048D5767B.description.1: Coke coal is far more better than ordinary coal.
quest.twr.77A7511048D5767B.description.2: But if you want to produce coke coal, you need to build a charcoal pit only with &b&lstone bricks or bronze door.
quest.twr.77A7511048D5767B.description.3: To produce coke coal, you must have a &6&l coal pile, not a log pile.
quest.twr.77A7511048D5767B.subtitle: Made of stone!
quest.twr.7887EB905BAA7BEF.description.1: Right-click to open the gui and add items.
quest.twr.7887EB905BAA7BEF.description.2: &b&lShift-empty-handed-right-click&r it to grind.&c(Both hands must be empty)
quest.twr.7887EB905BAA7BEF.description.4: Now with this invention, you can do some useful fuel processing to increase its burn time!
quest.twr.7887EB905BAA7BEF.subtitle: Not graphite
quest.twr.797D120146136A5C.description.1: Soil defrost level is unique because it is not affected by the environmental temperature, &bbut will only be raised by devices that can heat the soil&r, such as energy towers, or lowered by weather.
quest.twr.797D120146136A5C.description.3: The soil defrost level determines if a crop can be planted or grow in its current location.
quest.twr.797D120146136A5C.description.6: If the soil defrost level for a planted crop falls below the minimum planting level it will cause the crop to &bstop growing&r, with continued lowering possibly causing the crop to wilt.
quest.twr.797D120146136A5C.description.8: You will need to use a &bsoil thermometer&r to measure the soil defrost level.
quest.twr.797D120146136A5C.subtitle: No need to worry about out-of-season crops
quest.twr.797D120146136A5C.title: Soil Defrost Level
quest.twr.79D38F0D4D3E5482.description.1: Provides broader geological information in a smaller and deeper area.
quest.twr.79D38F0D4D3E5482.description.2: &6Including info about stone layer and ore info at the bottom
quest.twr.79D38F0D4D3E5482.description.3: &eCopper prospecting shovel has limited detecting depth. You might need some special techniques to find deeper ores...
quest.twr.79D38F0D4D3E5482.subtitle: So Deep a Shovel
quest.twr.7A2CCE64AEE955EC.description.0: Domesticating Wild Sheeps to get wool.
quest.twr.7A2CCE64AEE955EC.description.1: It eat grass and grow wool.
quest.twr.7A2CCE64AEE955EC.subtitle: Domesticating Wild Sheeps
quest.twr.7A2CCE64AEE955EC.title: Scalloping wool
quest.twr.7A992B9F9DB079E6.description.1: Incubators can incubate any sort of decomposer and produce related products.
quest.twr.7A992B9F9DB079E6.description.2: &d&lRefer to chapter "A Day of Siberian Chef"
quest.twr.7A992B9F9DB079E6.subtitle: I'd rather not know about this
quest.twr.7AA152F9B5AF6677.description.1: A multifunctional pot that integrates frying, braising, and stewing.
quest.twr.7AA152F9B5AF6677.description.2: The usage is very simple. Just throw in the food with any ingredient value description and cook and it's done. As for what it comes out...
quest.twr.7AA152F9B5AF6677.subtitle: In the cold winter, let's stew a pot of hot dishes.
quest.twr.7AC1F59A495B58AE.subtitle: Germany dishes
quest.twr.7AC1F59A495B58AE.title: Pork
quest.twr.7AFE32B08BB6CE6C.description.1: TeamMoeg is a non-profit Minecraft development group, where we met by common interests and guided by the same passion.
quest.twr.7AFE32B08BB6CE6C.subtitle: TeamMeog
quest.twr.7AFE32B08BB6CE6C.title: Developers List
quest.twr.7C21BA2D2453AA79.description.1: Got a surplus in creosote? Try our latest oil burner.
quest.twr.7C21BA2D2453AA79.description.2: Simply placing it on top of a coke oven consumes all creosote produced, while producing smoke for decoration(?)
quest.twr.7C21BA2D2453AA79.description.3: You can also pump more fluid into it to burn fluid faster, &mbut do not attempt to heat up with it&r.
quest.twr.7C21BA2D2453AA79.subtitle: Just...A Trashcan?
quest.twr.7C874B1F60354AB6.description.1: Forging ruins can be found in snowy biomes. The forging hammer in the ruins can be used to craft more advanced obsidian hammers and Nether alloy hammers.
quest.twr.7C874B1F60354AB6.title: Forging Relic
quest.twr.7D2807571451631F.description.2: Diorite, granodiorite, granite, gray granite, gabbro, and white marble.
quest.twr.7D2826CCB69C5EE8.description.1: It can be used as Tetra Tier 3 Hammer
quest.twr.7D2826CCB69C5EE8.subtitle: Better than a stone hammer
quest.twr.7D2BB5CE05B6723F.description.1: Remember to use ponder to check out the new machine features!
quest.twr.7DC424AE6C863411.description.1: Tools accumulate polishing value during use. Once the polishing value is full, a prompt will appear in the top-right corner.
quest.twr.7DC424AE6C863411.description.2: At this point, placing the tool in the crafting station allows you to choose parts and attributes for polishing. Polishing attributes to a certain level will consume durability.
quest.twr.7DC424AE6C863411.description.3: As the tool's durability decreases, the weapon becomes more stable. Each main part can be stabilized up to twice, with each stabilization increasing durability by a small amount.
quest.twr.7DC424AE6C863411.title: Polishing and Stabilization
quest.twr.7E3F0C805E2BBB9F.description.1: I can craft a tree stump at the workbench, a sturdy and durable base, which will allow me to process more resources.
quest.twr.7E3F0C805E2BBB9F.subtitle: Chopping board
quest.twr.7E3F0C805E2BBB9F.title: A sturdy stump
quest.twr.7E68FC6215F4FADC.description.1: In addition to charcoal, I can also bundle dry grass and dry it, which is another simple and convenient bonfire fuel.
quest.twr.7E68FC6215F4FADC.title: Hay Stacks
quest.twr.7E9108130096673E.description.1: Cheaper than bread, just like bread. But recommend cook before eating
quest.twr.7E9108130096673E.subtitle: Food Science
quest.twr.7EDDAD2D1E2B0613.description.1: It consumes less stress than bronze cogwheels.
quest.twr.7EDDAD2D1E2B0613.subtitle: Tougher
quest.twr.7EFFAF6A69D2EE66.description.1: Tree growth requires different &esoil temperatures&r, which you can check in the item description of the sapling.
quest.twr.7EFFAF6A69D2EE66.subtitle: Lumber!
quest.twr.7EFFAF6A69D2EE66.title: Tree Planting Guide
quest.twr.7F486B43F356A348.description.1: Under various scenarios, you may unlock quests with &bInsight Reward&r.
quest.twr.7F486B43F356A348.description.3: &bInsight&r is an important resource, much like your Experience Bar, but it is team-based, and do not reset when you die.
quest.twr.7F486B43F356A348.description.5: &bInsight Level&r progresses as you accumulate your &bInsight Point&r, much like your experience Level.
quest.twr.7F486B43F356A348.description.7: Every new Research needs a new &bInsight Level&r to unlock.
quest.twr.7F486B43F356A348.description.9: Keep the discovery spirit: You always earn Insight when you &bDiscover&r or &eCreate.&r
quest.twr.7F84766122DC4753.description.1: Resin required can be extracted from &bspruce, gum fir, cedar, etc.
quest.twr.7F84766122DC4753.description.2: If you can't find any cactus, you may also &emill malachite&r for green dye. &cRefer to JEI for more help&r.
quest.twr.7F84766122DC4753.subtitle: High-precision assembly
quest.twr.7F91A18F97F23E75.description.1: I discovered some colorful snowballs when shovelling snow... They seemed to be rich in useful minerals.
quest.twr.7F91A18F97F23E75.title: Weird Snow
